name: echocardiogram
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a test using ultrasound (= sound waves used to produce an image of the inside of someone's body) to examine the structure of the heart and how well it is working: An echocardiogram showed her heart was pumping out only about 10 oercent of the blood it collects, compared with about 60 percent in a healthy person.
